question.string: What was the average aid to environment per month in year 2010?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select (sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))/12) as ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-aid-to-environment ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. }

question.string: What is the average yearly aid over the Finnfund channel?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select avg(?yearly) as ?result{ select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?yearly ?year{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnfund". } }

question.string: How much money was given to strengthen civil society in Yemen?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15150>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ye>.}

question.string: How much is committed in Ethiopia?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?c)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/et>.}

question.string: How much does Peru receive for fishery research a year?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select avg(?sum) as ?result{ select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?sum ?year{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/pe>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31382>. ?obs lso:refYear ?year.}}

question.string: How many countries have extended amounts of  > 1000000 $?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(?country) as ?result{ select ?country{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amounts-extended ?extended. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country having sum(xsd:decimal(?extended))>1000000}

question.string: What is the total aid to Egypt?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/eg>.}

question.string: Which were the top 10 aided countries in 2011?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result. ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))) limit 10

question.string: How much money give Finnish Red Cross on health education?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12261>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish Red Cross".}

question.string: What is the amount of aid and the amount of commitments per country per year?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?total_aid sum(xsd:decimal(?commitments)) as ?total_commitments ?country{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitments. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country

question.string: How much money did the Egyptian government receive for rural development?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/43040>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/eg>.}

question.string: What's are the 10 highest aid amounts?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select xsd:decimal(?result){ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?result. } order by desc(xsd:decimal(?result)) limit 10

question.string: How much did Uruguay receive?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/uy>.}

question.string: How much money goes into food crop production over time?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?date sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31161>. ?obs lso:refDate ?date. } group by ?date

question.string: In South and Central Asia, how much aid was given to the regional FLEG programme in Mekong?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-short-description-project-title "Regional FLEG Programme in Mekong". ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/0>.}

question.string: How much money Embassy of Finland contribute to Egyptian projects?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Embassy of Finland". ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/eg>.}

question.string: Are there observations whose start date is after their end date?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> ask{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-start-date ?sd. ?obs lso:finland-aid-end-date ?ed. filter(?sd>?ed).}

question.string: What is average aid amount per aid sector?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?sector avg(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?average{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector.}

question.string: How much money gets each country in 2008?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:refYear "2008"^^xsd:gYear.}

question.string: How much extended amounts are given to Tajikistan for rescheduling and refinancing?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amounts-extended ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/tj>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/60040>.}

question.string: How much aid receives a country?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?sum{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amounts-extended ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.}

question.string: What is the total Dignity International aid from all sectors?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Dignity International".}

question.string: How much money Nepal receives for Environmental policy and administrative management?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amounts-extended ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/np>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/41010>.}

question.string: Top 10 aid receiving geographic areas in south east and central asia?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-geographical-target-area ?result. filter(?aid!=0 && ?result!=""). } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))) limit 10

question.string: Which country has the lowest amount of commitments?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result.} order by asc(sum(xsd:decimal(?c))) limit 1

question.string: Which countries received more than they were committed?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?c. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result.} group by ?result having sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>sum(xsd:decimal(?c))

question.string: Where is the biggest aid for medical services?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12191>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?result. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))) limit 1

question.string: Which country receives the biggest share of its aid from Fida International?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country{ select ?country sum(xsd:decimal(?aid_fida))/sum(xsd:decimal(?aid_all)) as ?fida_share{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid_fida. ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Finnish NGO, Fida International".} UNION { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid_all. }}} order by desc(?fida_share) limit 1

question.string: Which types of flow are there?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select distinct(?result){ ?obs lso:finland-aid-type-of-flow-main-dac-1-category ?result.}

question.string: For which sectors is the money, invested into Sierra Leona, used for?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/sl>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?result.}

question.string: How many percent aid of a country is for that countries administrative costs?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country sum(xsd:decimal(?aid_admin))/sum(xsd:decimal(?aid_all))*100 as ?admin_percent{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid_admin. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/91010>. } UNION { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid_all. }}

question.string: Which type of sector is receiving the most in India?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/in>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: How much aid is received by Zambia on a single day?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?total/?years/365.242 {{ select count(distinct(?year)) as ?years{ ?obs lso:refYear ?year. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/zm>. } }{ select sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?total{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/zm>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. } }}

question.string: What was the total amount recieved by Yemen in 2010?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)){ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ye>.}

question.string: Which countries got more than 1000000 € but less than 10000000 € in 2010?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>1000000&&sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))<10000000)

question.string: Which countries got between 10000 € and 100000 € in 2011?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.} group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>10000&&sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))<100000)

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12261>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-geographical-target-area "Pyongyang".}

question.string: What types of aid did the Maldives receive in 2011 for Oil-fired power plants?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select distinct(?result){ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/mv>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-type-of-aid ?result. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/23061>. ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear.}

question.string: What is the total amount of Gambia in 2008?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/gm>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2008"^^xsd:gYear.}

question.string: How many countries had amounts of more than 1000000 € in 2010?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(?country) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.} group by ?country having sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>1000000

question.string: How many countries received more than 1000000 € for government administration in 2006?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(?country) as ?result{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear "2006"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15140>.} group by ?country having sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))>1000000

question.string: How much does Crisis Management Initiative spend on strengthening civil society compared to legal and judicial development?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?society)) as ?society_total sum(xsd:decimal(?legal)) as ?legal_total{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "Crisis Management Initiative".{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?society. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15150>.} UNION{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?legal. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15130>.}}

question.string: How much money, does the UNDP spend on elections compared to post-conflict peace building?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select sum(xsd:decimal(?elections)) as ?elections_total sum(xsd:decimal(?peace)) as ?peace_total{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-channel-of-delivery-name "UNDP".{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?elections. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15161>.} UNION{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?peace. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15230>.} }

question.string: What is the type of aid with the lowest total amount?

question.string: What are the top 5 types of aid regarding the amount?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?type{ ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-type-of-aid ?type.} order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 5

question.string: What was the largest aid for debt forgiveness in 2007?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select max(xsd:decimal(?amount)) as ?result{ ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/60020>. ?obs lso:refYear "2008"^^xsd:gYear.}

question.string: How much is the total aid amount by the World Health Organization?

question.string: In which years was the total amount given for medical services higher than that for basic nutrition?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?year { { select ?year sum(xsd:integer(?amount1)) as ?sum1 sum(xsd:integer(?amount2)) as ?sum2 { ?obs1 lso:refYear ?year. ?obs2 lso:refYear ?year. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12191>. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12240>. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount1. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount2. } group by ?year } filter(?sum1>?sum2).}

question.string: How many of the countries got more than 100000000 € in 2011?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(distinct(?country)) {{ select ?country { ?obs lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount.} group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?amount)) > 1000000) }}

question.string: How many countries recieved more aid in 2011 than in 2010?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(?country){ select distinct(?country) {{ ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount1. ?obs1 lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } UNION{ ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount2. ?obs2 lso:refYear "2011"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country.} } group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?amount1))<sum(xsd:decimal(?amount2)))}

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(?country){ select distinct(?country) {{ ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount1. ?obs1 lso:refYear "2006"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } UNION{ ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount2. ?obs2 lso:refYear "2010"^^xsd:gYear. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. } } group by ?country having (sum(xsd:decimal(?amount1))>0&&sum(xsd:decimal(?amount2))>0)}

question.string: What is the country with the lowest average aid amount?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select ?country{ ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country ?country. ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount. } order by asc(avg(xsd:decimal(?amount))) limit 1

question.string: Which are the sectors of aid to the geographical area of Dhaka?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select distinct(?sector){ ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs lso:finland-aid-geographical-target-area "Dhaka".}

question.string: In how many years did Sierra Leona recieve aid for malaria control?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select count(distinct(?year)){ ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12262>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/sl>. ?obs lso:refYear ?year.}

question.string: Which sectors have Paraguay and the Central African Republic in common?

query.sparql: prefix ls: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/instance/>  prefix qb: <http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#> prefix lso: <http://linkedspending.aksw.org/ontology/> select distinct ?sector{ ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/cf>. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-sector ?sector. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/py>.}
